docs.lead_paragraph: A new technique surpassed standard testing in detecting chromosomal abnormalities that can cause problems like autism or mental retardation.

headline.seo: Clinical Trial Yields Positive Results for New Prenatal Test
headline.main: Clinical Trial Is Favorable for a Prenatal Gene Test
headline.print_headline: Clinical Trial Is Favorable For a Prenatal Gene Test

docs.abstract: Researchers say a new method of prenatal testing surpasses standard testing in detecting chromosomal abnormalities that can cause problems like autism or mental retardation.

docs.lead_paragraph: Priorities USA Action, a “super PAC” supporting President Obama, released an advertisement on Tuesday suggesting that Mitt Romney’s actions at Bain Capital indirectly contributed to a woman’s death.

headline.main: Ex-Factory Worker Links Losses to Bain
headline.print_headline: Ex-Factory Worker Links Losses to Bain

docs.abstract: Text and assessment of advertisement by Priorities USA Action, super PAC supporting Pres Obama, that suggests Mitt Romney’s actions at Bain Capital indirectly contributed to death of the wife of former factory worker Joe Soptic.

docs.lead_paragraph: Despite President Obama’s support for same-sex marriage, Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan invited both him and Mitt Romney to speak at a charity event for the New York Archdiocese in October.

headline.seo: Dolan Invites Obama and Romney to Al Smith Dinner
headline.main: Dolan Will Let Obama and Romney Joke It Up at the Al Smith Dinner
headline.print_headline: Dolan Will Let Obama and Romney Joke It Up

docs.abstract: Cardinal Timothy M Dolan leaves policy issues asides, and invites both Pres Obama and Mitt Romney to speak at the Alfred E Smith Memorial Foundation Dinner, a glittering New York Catholic Charity event; Obama's invitation has generated dismay, especially among some opponents of abortion, who point out that there are precedents for barring presidential candidates from the dinner.
docs.snippet: Despite President Obama’s support for same-sex marriage, Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan invited both him and Mitt Romney to speak at a charity event for the New York Archdiocese in October.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: Politicians on the left and right continue to attack the loss of American jobs, but have yet to develop policies to deal with globalization’s challenge to American workers.

headline.seo: In Outsourcing Attacks, Tired Posturing and Little Leadership - Economic Scene

docs.abstract: Eduardo Porter Economic Scene column holds that politicians on both sides continue to attack outsourcing and the loss of American jobs, but they have yet to develop policies to deal with globalization's challenge to American workers.
docs.snippet: Politicians on the left and right continue to attack the loss of American jobs, but have yet to develop policies to deal with globalization’s challenge to American workers.
